name: cerb.editor.toolbar.markdownImage
description: Insert an image with Markdown formatting
script:
start:
  await:
    form:
      title: Insert an image
      elements:
        fileUpload/prompt_file_id:
          label: File:
          required@bool: yes
        text/prompt_alt:
          label: Alternate text:
          type: freeform
          #default:
  set:
    prompt_file__context: attachment
  return:
    snippet@text,trim:
      ![{{prompt_alt|default(prompt_file__label)}}]({{prompt_file_url_download}})
